watchlist_seo_title: Stock Watchlist - Track Your Portfolio & Monitor Stock Prices
watchlist_seo_description: Create and manage your personal stock watchlist with real-time price tracking. Monitor your favorite stocks, ETFs, and investments with price alerts and performance analytics. Free stock portfolio tracker with advanced features.
watchlist_seo_keywords: stock watchlist, portfolio tracker, stock tracker, investment tracker, stock monitoring, price alerts, portfolio management, stock performance, investment watchlist
watchlist_structured_description: Personal stock watchlist and portfolio tracking tool
watchlist_empty_description: Fill it up with your favorite stocks and get realtime data and the latest news in one place!
watchlist_no_news: No news yet. Add some stocks to the watchlist to see the latest news.
watchlist_no_earnings: No earnings data available. Add some stocks to the watchlist to see the latest earnings data.
watchlist_modal_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this watchlist? This action cannot be undone.
watchlist_toast_error: Something went wrong. Please try again!
watchlist_toast_error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again later.
watchlist_toast_title_long: Title is too long. Keep it simple and concise bruv!
watchlist_toast_already_in_list: This symbol is already in your watchlist
watchlist_toast_select_symbols: You need to select symbols before you can delete them
